alert.note: Alert for Color Country Mountains; Grand Staircase (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 03 at 9:53PM MDT until July 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 496 AND 498... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 496 Color Country Mountains and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts to around mph Monday afternoon and evening. Winds will be lighter overnight tonight. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Falling into the 8 to 13 percent range Monday afternoon below 7000 feet, 13 to 18 percent above 7000 feet. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are likely to occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
